artist: Painter: After Jean Baptist van Heil; Engraver: Frederik Bouttats; Publisher: Jan Meyssens
description: portrait 1/2 length of Leo van Heil facing slightly right looking left, wearing cloak with flat white lace edged collar; holding archetectural drawing in right hand
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [LEO VAN HEIL/ faict bien en illuminature des fleurs et mouches et autres petites animaux/ au naturel, s\'entend fort bien en l\'Architecture et batiments de maisons et/ en perspectives, est ne a Brusselles Jan. 1605/ Je. Bapt. van Heil pinxit  Fred Bottats sculpsit Je. Meyssens execudit]; on sheet in pencil: [1-528 / first imp\'n]
portfolio: From Image de divers hommes 1649/ The true effiges of the most eminent painters ...1705
title: Portrait of Leo Van Heil
